result:
The Sonar Way

It isn’t just our product that sets us apart from the competition. At Sonar, we pride ourselves on taking a different approach to customer service – something more personal, and more involved. We do business the Sonar way.
Find out more about the Sonar way below, or jump straight into the numbers.

Building partnerships

Our customers are our partners. That’s why our pricing is structured in such a way that our success is aligned with yours. Ultimately, our goal is to help you grow. And we believe in good first impressions. That’s why on-boarding is free. We don’t believe in hitting new customers with unwarranted fees for the privilege of coming aboard. We’re happy to have you here. The way we see it, this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship.

Building partnerships

Our customers are our partners. That’s why our pricing is structured in such a way that our success is aligned with yours. Ultimately, our goal is to help you grow. And we believe in good first impressions. That’s why on-boarding is free. We don’t believe in hitting new customers with unwarranted fees for the privilege of coming aboard. We’re happy to have you here. The way we see it, this is the beginning of a beautiful friendship.

An opportunity, not an obstacle

Many companies have fears about leaving behind their legacy software. They worry about downtime, and the difficulty of moving data. That’s why we make the transition to Sonar earth-shatteringly simple. We’ll be on-hand to help with the heavy lifting of data. We’ll even help identify areas of revenue leakage and missed opportunities. We’ll tidy up your customer data, ensuring you’re in a much better place after the transition to Sonar. Oh, and we’re an efficient bunch. On-boarding with Sonar takes days and weeks, rather than months and years. So you’ll be up and running in no time.

Start as you mean to go on

Our first-rate customer service doesn’t stop at day one. You can get us anytime, anywhere – via phone, email, or through the website. We’re here every step of the way to help you get the most from the Sonar product, and use it to really grow your business. After all, that’s what Sonar was built for. Helpful documentation is always just a click away, and is made contextually available as you navigate the system. For new features, our Sonar Casts provide updates to keep you up to speed.
